item.title: About
item.description: Menus are a powerful but simple feature for content management but can be easily manipulated in your templates to meet your design needs. Hugo makes no assumptions about how your rendered HTML will be structured. Instead, it provides all of the functions you will need to be able to build your menu however you want. The following is an example: If you use the front matter method of defining menu entries, youâ€™ll get access to the .
